paragraph 1: The Group’s associates are considered to be related parties.
paragraph 2: As at 30 March 2019 the following are also considered to be related parties under the Listing Rules due to their shareholdings exceeding 10% of the Group’s total issued share capital:
paragraph 3: − Nissin Foods Holdings Co., Ltd. (“Nissin”) is considered to be a related party to the Group by virtue of its 19.47% (2017/18: 19.57%) equity shareholding in Premier Foods plc and of its power to appoint a member to the Board of directors.− Oasis Management Company Ltd (“Oasis”) is considered to be a related party to the Group by virtue of its 11.99% (2017/18: 9.01%) equity shareholding in Premier Foods plc and of its power to appoint a member to the Board of directors.
paragraph 4: − Paulson Investment Company LLC, (“Paulson”) is considered to be a related party to the Group by virtue of its 11.98% (2017/18: 7.39%) equity shareholding in Premier Foods plc and of its power to appoint a member to the Board of directors.
paragraph 5: As at 30 March 2019 the Group had outstanding balances with Hovis. Total trade receivables was £0.9m (2017/18: £0.5m) and total trade payables was £0.6m (2017/18: £2.5m).
